page.title: 06The Trouts
page.content: ..concrete blocks for Prospect House, before calling in the builder.The small guest house was so successful that it was soon expanded & by 1933 was known as{Trouts' Hotel.} { Jim Trout}, an elderly resident of Hallsands,& 2nd. cousin of the Trout Sisters recalled the sisters &village life.In winter when the level of the shingle drops,a fossil forest,{peat} & clay deposit is exposed.Local residents used to cut this to use as {winter fuel.}He also noted the rapid {cliff erosion}& the increasingly precarious position of Trouts' Hotel & Mildmay Cottages.
